item.title: Merapi Meletus Hari Ini, Tinggi Kolom Erupsi 6000 Meter dari Puncak
item.description: Gunung Merapi meletus pada Selasa pagi, 3 Maret 2020 dan memicu kolom abu setinggi 6000 meter di atas puncak. Merapi Meletus Hari Ini, Tinggi Kolom Erupsi 6000 Meter dari Puncak - Tirto.

item.title: 'Я думала, что посиневшие лица - это прикол'. Блогерша Диденко вместо скорби выступила на шоу Первого канала. Как это было
item.description: Первый канал и Россия 1 сняли передачи о вечеринке с сухим льдом, в результате которой погибли трое человек. На Пусть говорят пришла сама блогерша Екатерина Диденко “Я думала, что посиневшие лица - это прикол”.

item.title: 劉真爆腦出血搶救中 命理師：快找他
item.description: 娛樂中心／綜合報導 劉真在榮總與死神搏鬥，至今狀況沒有明顯進展

item.title: Confirman primer caso de coronavirus en Argentina
item.description: Un vocero del ministerio de Salud de la Ciudad de Buenos Aires le confirmó a CNN el primer caso de coronavirus en Argentina. Lo que sabemos de los casos coronavirus hoy en América Latina Ah… Confirman primer caso de coronavirus en Argentina Primer caso de coronavirus en Argentina 0:27

item.title: Elisabeth Moss finally responds to those rumors Scientology has arranged her marriage to Tom Cruise
item.description: Someone apparently would like to see the prominent church members get married. Elisabeth Moss finally responds to those rumors Scientology has arranged her marriage to Tom Cruise Even with the surreal nature of Tom Cruise’s personal life, this rumor is pretty outstandish.

item.title: What category was the nashville tornado 2020?
item.description: The governor asked that residents be cautious when traveling to vote in the Super Tuesday primary election. An EF-3 Tennessee tornadoes kill at least 24 people, including children, and leave a trail of destruction “I ran into the hallway bathroom, screaming — trying to get everyone to wake up,” Sharrett said.

item.title: Shea's announces show-stopping 2020-21 season
item.description: The 2020-21 season was announced Tuesday evening Shea’s announces show-stopping 2020-21 season BUFFALO, N.Y. (WKBW) — Get ready for a show-stopping, toe-tapping season at Shea’s Performing Arts Center in Buffalo.

item.title: Radio presenter Neil Prendeville named on latest tax defaulters' list from Revenue
item.description: RADIO PRESENTER ON Cork’s RedFM, Neil Prendeville, has been listed on Revenue’s latest list of tax defaulters for 2019. Prendeville, who hosts a daily morning show on the local Cork radio station, is listed as owing €541,636 in a combination of taxes, interest and penalties.

item.title: Hillary Clinton's Email 'Scandal': How Will It Affect the Election?
item.description: With the Democratic Presidential Nomination in sight, Hillary Clinton must still contend with a continuous conversation about her email practices. How will this scandal, or non-scandal, affect the presidential race yet to come?

item.title: Ontario's Dundas Peak 'ghost' appears in Reddit user's image
item.description: A hiker has claimed to have seen ‘a thin person with no visible face’ at Dundas Peak in Hamilton, Ontario in a spot he said was ‘completely inaccessible’. ‘Thin person with no face’ appears in image at Ontario’s Dundas Peak ‘Ghost’ appears in walker’s photo: A ‘thin person with no face’ is spotted in image at Ontario’s Dundas Peak – and his friends cannot recreate it **Reddit user visited Dundas Peak in Hamilton, Ontario with a friend ** His friend’s cousin had gone a few days earlier and posted picture to Instagram That picture showed a ghost-like figure lurking in the background But when he tried to recreate the image, he could not see the same figure Published: 12:50 GMT, 8 June 2016 | Updated: 15:09 GMT, 8 June 2016

item.title: People Called A Black Woman–Owned Company “Racist” After A Target Ad. Its Sales Have Doubled, The Owner Said.
item.description: People vowed to stop buying the Honey Pot Company’s products after they claimed it was “racist,” but the company’s sales have since doubled, its owner said. People Called A Black Woman–Owned Company “Racist” After A Target Ad.
